name: Mystery Tower
description:
You find yourself trapped in a tower

Who trapped you?
Why?
Where is this tower?
Did the dev just made all this up to pretend the game has some sort of story?

It's a mystery

Push and pull blocks to make stairways and bridges, so you may climb the tower

NOTE: This game is based on Catherine, developed by Atlus. This game is not affiliated with, endorsed by, sponsored by or specifically approved by Atlus, SEGA, or their partners.
